Line5.B757A: Baltok, though wounded, refused to let the Grizzly's Maul leave his hands as he was dragged away.
Line3.B757A: Our ancestors always reclaimed it whenever the wielder fell, just as we do now.
Line1.B757A: The Grizzly's Maul is from a time when we lived on Mount Arreat... a time when the children of Bul-Kathos carried it into battle against the demons that lay siege to the land.
